'''Denys Vernon Hawthorne''' ([[9 August]], [[1932]]-[[16 October]], [[2009]]) was a Northern Irish actor, who lent his voice to many of the [[BBC]]'s radio plays. He voiced [[Beorn]] in the [[1968]] [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|radio series]] of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.
